structure.unit: Courts, Judicial Officers And Proceedings In Civil Cases
Proceedings For Settlement Of Title To Land

law.text: Whoever, during the pendency of proceedings for the division of flats, acquires by purchase, devise or descent, or by the enforcement of a mortgage or lien, an interest or title in or to any flats which are the subject matter of such proceedings, may by order of the court be made a party to such proceedings, and shall be chargeable with such share of the expenses as the court orders.
